sentence.Network_en: A stringed instrument of a long, fretted fingerboard with resonating gourds at each end.
sentence.Network_cn: 与木琴相似但是含有金属棒和在共鸣器中的旋转盘的打击乐器.

sentence.Network_en: When you dress your fingerboard, do you take a little relief out of your bass side?
sentence.Network_cn: 但我还不知道怎样把吉他做到像你一样.

sentence.Network_en: Ebony fingerboard, both jujube wood and ebony sets can be supplied; rosewood end pin, metal tailpiece.
sentence.Network_cn: 乌木指板, 枣木配件和乌木配件两种, 红木尾柱, 金属拉线板.

means.word_mean: 1. a guidepost resembling a hand with a pointing index finger
2. a bank of keys on a musical instrument
3. a narrow strip of wood on the neck of some stringed instruments (violin or cello or guitar etc) where the strings are held against the wood with the fingers
